input.sentences: i went shopping in location location today .
the buildings all looked very similar .
my favorite store on the street did n't even have a sign .
i realized i was shopping on a campus and not downtown .
and as soon as i realized that i ran right into the universities main student center .
output.sentences: I applied for university at Chapman so we took a daytrip to the town to see the sights.
We went to the local shopping mall.
So many of the buildings looked so similar that we got lost.
We eventually made it to the university and had a look around at the law school where I have applied.
